title: Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin interprets drinking alcohol in a dream in most places as money from a forbidden source. Whoever sees himself drinking alcohol in a dream, this indicates that he is deprived of money without effort, and whoever sees himself drinking alcohol alone, this also indicates that he is deprived of money without effort. Evidence of forbidden money: He saw that he drinks alcohol in partnership with others, then this is evidence of rivalry and strife with this person. Also, drinking alcohol in a dream can indicate praiseworthy things such as recovery from illness, marriage to an unmarried person, or an increase in wealth. Knowledge, or abundant sustenance for the poor. Drinking wine is evidence that the dead person will give you Paradise in the afterlife. Explanation of PreparationWine in a dreamWhoever sees that he is preparing or buying alcohol, this indicates that this person will suffer a lot of harm and will get into problems and must be careful. Interpretation of wine in a dreamWhoever sees wine in a dream without To drink it is evidence of hatred, hatred, disobedience to parents, revealing secrets and other sins. Interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi will interpret drinking alcohol in a dream to mean forbidden money or multiple sins and transgressions. Whoever dreams that he insists on alcohol in his dream, this is evidence that he will serve A ruler, and that he has a good position. Interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted drinking alcohol in a dream as money from a forbidden source, which may be from theft, fraud, or plundering an orphan’s money and other forbidden sources. Interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream for a single woman, a girl who is not If a married woman sees herself in a dream drinking alcohol, this is evidence of her ignorance of what... He is around her in the affairs of her home, her husband, and her children, and she must be careful and careful in that. Interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees herself in a dream drinking alcohol, this is evidence of easy childbirth, nutrition, and many good things.

title: What do you know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing jellyfish in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a jellyfish in a dream by the great interpreters: A jellyfish is a delicate marine creature and is one of the marine animals. They have been found on sea surfaces since ancient times and are continuous and preserved until today, from the era before the dinosaurs. Scientists explained by explaining who saw the dream. Jellyfish in a dream. The interpretation of seeing it in a dream varies. It is a weak, emaciated body that can be harmful to humans. It is a gelatinous organism that secretes a very sticky substance, and this substance has many colors, such as white and blue. Or transparent, and these fluids come out of his body, causing allergies on the human skin. In most cases, seeing a jellyfish in a dream may be a sad or weak vision for the viewer and depends on his condition, and people can see it in their dreams according to their gender and social status, and from here the interpretation of this vision varies by scientists. ...and there are those who see it in their homes or on the street, and other cases are interpreted by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, as they interpreted these matters accurately and in more than one way for all cases. Interpretation of seeing a jellyfish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a jellyfish in a dream as follows: When A person sees a jellyfish in a dream, this is a sign of a husband or son. Seeing a jellyfish in a dream is evidence that the person who dreams of it has knowledge and knowledge. Whoever sees it in a dream, this is evidence of repentance from a great sin or guidance after disbelief. Whoever sees in His dream is that he went to the mosque and found a jellyfish, then this is evidence of the seriousness and piety of the one who delivers the sermon inside the mosque and of the senior scholars. Whoever dreams of being inside a mosque and finds a dead jellyfish, the imam of that mosque will die. It could also be evidence that the pregnant woman will give birth to a boy. Seeing a jellyfish in a dream for a pregnant womanSeeing a jellyfish in a dream for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees a jellyfish in her dream, this may be evidence that her child will be a boy and her birth may be a bit wobbly, but she and her child will recover quickly and will be healthy as quickly as possible. Guide and interpretation of seeing a jellyfish. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Seeing it in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s weakness and lack of size and an indication of the ease with which he can be harmed and the number of problems he faces from his enemies. Seeing it in A dream about the whole house indicates sadness near the dreamer, and if it is centered in one of the dreamer’s private parts, this means that a weak person wants to deceive him and harm him. If he sees him in a public place or in a guest place in the house, the interpretation of seeing this dream is illness or distress. It can affect someone in the house and they will leave quickly. The damage it causes is weak to overcome. Seeing it swimming in the water is a sign of a lot of food that the dreamer will receive soon. Fear of catching it or touching it for fear of feeling it, and the interpretation of this is that whoever sees the dream will suffer a temporary illness, misfortune, or temporary disorder such as feeling Palo

title: Interpretation of the police in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the police in a dream has many interpretations, according to what Ibn Sirin sees. The police are a symbol of protection and security and are the party that everyone turns to when something happens, whether it is a crime or a problem, to resolve the existing conflict, or even to try to find the culprit in the case of crimes. But what is the interpretation of seeing a company in a dream? This is what we will show you today through our next article in the encyclopedia. As we will discuss the interpretation of this vision for single and married women, as well as pregnant women, all you have to do is follow us.Interpretation of the police in a dreamThe police in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great jurist, Ibn Sirin, interprets seeing the police in a dream as one of the dreams that carries many meanings and is often a sign of safety. And the full protection that the dreamer enjoys in life. This vision also foretells to him that he is on a smooth path without dangers, God willing. If the fortuneteller is able to talk to the policeman in the dream and then free him, this is a sign of overcoming difficulties, passing the tests with great success, and an end to the obstacles that were blocked. The path of insight. And if the police enter the dreamer’s house in a dream, this is a sign that he will live safely in his home, and great care will be provided to him and his family. In some cases, seeing the police in a dream is a sign of restoring many things that were missing from the dreamer, whether they are Material or moral. As for the dispute with the police or disagreement with them, it is a reflection of the state of fear and tension that the viewer is experiencing. If the dreamer finds himself in a dream trying to escape from the police, then his dream is considered a sign of his extreme fear of the future and his desire to plan for the future despite his inability to do so. Interpretation of the police in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing the police in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions and an indication of the great good that the dreamer will achieve in reality. As it is good news that the dangers to which he was exposed will end and he will enjoy security and stability in life. The policeman, according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, represents the man who will help the dreamer achieve all the desires and dreams he wants in life. The policeman chases the dreamer in the dream as if he is the culprit who has committed many problems, A sign that he has committed many sins in his life, and he must repent and return to God Almighty to forgive him all his sins and misdeeds. Committed.If the dreamer sees that he is surrounded by a large number of police officers working to protect him, his vision is an indication that he will obtain a prestigious position and status in the near future, at the work level. . Seeing the police in a single woman’s dream. If a single girl finds out that I have joined the police, this is a sign that she will get a big promotion at work, God willing, and her vision can be a sign of her ability to succeed and achieve the goals that she has always dreamed of. Who. But if an unmarried girl sees me talking to a policeman, then her vision is good news that she will marry a tall man and she will be happy with him and she will be aware of the security and stability around him. Interpretation of a dream about a policeman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lipstick by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lipstick by Ibn Sirin, knowing that it is one of the dreams in which interpretation scholars differed, and the reason for this is that a girl’s adornment may not appear except to her mahrams, so we present. For this article, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about lipstick. Seeing lipstick for a married woman. There is no doubt that this dream in a married woman’s dream is one of the visions that indicate in its content a number of important and different connotations, which appeared as follows: Certainly this dream in a woman’s dream has several signs. It varies depending on the circumstances and her psychological state. In the event that a married woman is already facing some disputes, marital problems, and a lack of comfort and stability, her vision will certainly indicate her desire and inclinations to get rid of these problems and end them, thus drawing her husband’s attention to them. Whereas if her married life is full of comfort and stability, this symbolizes the extent of her love and affection. To her husband. In addition to maintaining her fitness and taking care of her femininity and beauty. However, if the husband is the one who puts lipstick on his wife in the dream, this indicates his love and respect for her, as well as his interest in her. The same vision may also indicate that this wife has wisdom in managing the affairs of Her life and the life of her family. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing this color on her lips in an inappropriate way, as their appearance appears ugly. This indicates that she will be exposed to troubles and problems in the next stage. Interpretation of a dream about red lips. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing lips in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation A dream about lipstick for a man: In fact, when a man sees this dream in his dream, he feels very confused and anxious, such that he does not have a correct interpretation according to his diligence, so the interpretation of his dream is explained as follows: In the event that the man has never married and sees this dream in his dream where he does makeup for a girl This undoubtedly indicates the imminence of his relationship and marriage, and God Almighty knows best. Likewise, if a married man sees in a dream that his wife is wearing lipstick. This may express the extent of her concern for her and her husband, and this dream is also an indication of her love for him and her efforts to make him happy. However, if a man puts it on himself during his sleep, this undoubtedly symbolizes that he is considered one of the hypocritical men. The same vision could indicate the weakness of this man’s character and his inability to perform duties and responsibilities. Whereas if that man was single, and he saw a beautiful girl in his dream, where She put it in an exciting way. There is no doubt that this indicates that he will soon become attached to this girl, and that she will be suitable for him, and will give him obedience and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about red lipsRead also: A detailed interpretation of a dream about seeing plastic surgery in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about red lips by Ibn SirinAn interpreter has come Visions and dreams, the scholar Ibn Sirin, provided a series of interpretations and interpretations regarding a man dreaming of a red pen. This interpretation is as follows: If a young man sees in his dream a girl blushing on her mouth, this means that he has an emotional relationship in his life. Also, if a young man dreams that his ex-fiancée was wearing lipstick, this indicates that he will return to her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a fetus crying in its mother’s womb in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a fetus crying in its mother’s womb. If you hear in your dream that a fetus is crying in its mother’s womb and you want to know the meaning of that, we will show you in the following lines. Interpretation of a fetus crying in its mother’s womb in a dream - Interpretation scholars have reported that a fetus crying indicates anxiety and fear - A married woman can also indicate crises and problems that may You face it - The crying of the fetus may indicate the dreamer’s ill health - It indicates health problems that you may face during pregnancy - Interpretation of the dream of seeing fetal organs in a dream - Interpretation scholars have shown that the appearance of fetal organs in a dream can indicate the progress and position to which the dreamer will advance. - The pregnant woman also sees organs The fetus, this is a sign of the growth of the fetus. It also indicates a married woman who is pregnant or breastfeeding. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the fetus’s genitals in a dream. Interpretation scholars interpreted seeing the fetus’s reproductive organs in a dream as a sign of some things that the dreamer is trying to hide. Seeing the fetus’s reproductive organs also indicates a desire A woman who knows the sex of the fetus - like a married woman - saw the fetus’s organs while she was giving birth, this is an indication of some matters that she is dealing with - just as he saw the fetus’s reproductive organs and it was a girl, this is evidence of nourishment and goodness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the fetus with ultrasound in a dream - Interpretation scholars interpreted seeing the fetus on the ultrasound as evidence of some matters About the dreamer - If he sees the fetus deeply, it is sound and has a good pulse, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s livelihood. - A pregnant woman can also indicate the health of the fetus - while if the woman sees some problems facing the fetus in the ultrasound, this is an indication that this woman may face problems. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a fetus talking in a dream - If a pregnant woman dreams that the fetus is talking, this is an indication that the fetus is in good health - If a married woman sees the fetus talking in a dream, this is a sign that she will give birth to a new baby - If a girl sees her fetus talking in a dream, this is a sign of some good things - As it may indicate marriage or a relationship with a good person of good qualities. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sex of the fetus in a dream - Interpretation scholars have reported that seeing a male fetus in a dream indicates some good things - as it may indicate relief from the dreamer’s worries and judgments - it can also indicate sustenance and kindness that will occur. According to the dreamer - while if a woman sees a fetus in a dream, this is a sign of the presence of a girl. Interpretation of a dream of a small fetus in a dream - Interpretation scholars have reported that the presence of a small fetus in a dream may indicate small desires - as the presence of a small fetus in a dream may indicate a small desire that the dreamer wants to fulfill - seeing a small fetus For a married woman, it may also indicate that this woman may become pregnant and face some problems. It could also be a sign of small problems that the woman may face. I dreamed that I heard the heartbeat of a fetus in a dream. Interpretation scholars have indicated that hearing the heartbeat of the fetus in a dream indicates goodness and life. Hearing the heartbeat of a fetus Poor girl

title: How long is the dream?  The normal rate of dreams per day

preview.html: How long is the dream? The normal rate of dreams per day, where dreams are a series of mental fantasies that occur to a person during sleep, some of which are related to his subconscious mind and its effect on it, and they may be dreams that have no logical explanation, but how long does a dream last in reality over a period of time? We will find out on the Summit website. Read more: Seeing a promise in a dream What is the duration of a dream? In the process of researching the duration of a dream, the dream does not last seconds, but the person’s subconscious feels as if he is dreaming all night and the dream appears within a few hours, as in some studies it has been shown that Dreams do not last more than ten seconds, while the rest is done by the subconscious, as Dr. Mustafa Mahmoud said that the sleeper is in a time that differs from the normal time of a person’s life. Read more: Backgrounds in a dream How long does a dream take? Continuing to talk about how long a dream lasts , the time that the clock releases in sleep is subject to another estimate, which is to imagine it contracting and expanding with a strange unexpected desire or crowded within the framework of sleep time, because it is not. hour. Events may occur throughout the year, such as marriage, divorce, and love, and all of this happened in a few seconds, as it can be said that most dreams are wishes that a person wishes. Read more: Seeing pins in a dream. How many dreams does a person have in one night? The number of dreams a person has in a day is 3. - 4 dreams per day, and there is an opinion that there are 6-7 dreams, sometimes 7-10 dreams, and each dream lasts 6-10 seconds. According to statistics, the average person dreams more than 1,460 times a year. The dream time does not exceed one hour. The dream often occurs at dawn. The duration and richness of dreams during sleep enhances memory and students have strong understanding and speed to overcome. Read more: Piano in a dreamThe most important scientific facts about Duration of the dreamIn light of the research on how long a dream lasts, there are a number of scientifically proven dream facts, which we will learn as follows:If one dreams 8 dreams a day, the largest dream is the last.If you dream more than once during your sleep in nights or nights Different, it means that you are making a mistake in something in your life and you have to review this mistake. In some cases the dreamer can see that he is flying or falling, and here the subconscious mind intervenes so that the person does not die and wakes up. Among God’s blessings is that he created man for himself, which is muscle relaxation. During sleep, a person's muscles are in a state of complete paralysis except for the diaphragm and eye muscles, and after waking up all muscles are active. title: Interpretation of coral reefs in a dream: Seeing red or black coral in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Coral reefs wearing a coral pearl necklace in the dreams of a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing coral in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing coral reefs in a dream is considered a good, good and good omen. Coral in a man’s dream is a sign of abundance of money and abundance or a woman of great beauty and grace. Seeing a pendant or pendant Coral is an unpleasant dream and it is unpleasant to see. Interpretation of coral in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. As for coral, it is a woman who has a child, and it is said that coral gives birth. The redder his child is, the purer and purer it is, and if he carries it, it means a lot of money and blessings. A man sees coral in a dream. A man seeing coral in a dream shows the work that is returned to the person with a lot of halal money. As for seeing a man buying coral in a dream, it is good and interprets the goodness that The person will reward him in reality. As for a single woman seeing coral in a dream. Coral in a woman’s dream is very good, and for an unmarried girl or for an unmarried woman to see coral in her dream, this is a sign of good luck, blessings, a lot of food, and a lot of money. Seeing a married woman made of coral in a dream. As for For a married woman who sees coral in her dream, this indicates the fulfillment of all her long-awaited desires and dreams that cannot be achieved, and it may indicate the abundance of money. Seeing a pregnant woman made of coral in a dream. Seeing coral in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her safety, the safety of her fetus, and the abundance of goodness in The future. Seeing coral in a dream coming out of the sea. Seeing the sea in a dream is considered a door to goodness and livelihood, and therefore seeing anything coming out of the sea in a dream is evidence of food, goodness and halal. Seeing coral in a dreamAs for the dreamer who sees that he is searching for coral reefs in his dream This indicates the dreamer’s worries, responsibilities, and constant search for solutions to his problems, escaping life’s problems, or escaping the situation. From depression and psychological distress in the dream, this indicates that you will get out of trouble after patience, effort and a long time. Seeing a collection of red coral in a dream. As for the person who sees in a dream that he is collecting red coral, this indicates that this person has a strong and independent personality and will achieve many of his hopes and aspirations in his professional life. Or the process. Seeing a coral necklace in a dream. As for seeing a red coral pendant or pendant, it is disliked and seeing it is not good because it indicates psychological problems related to emotions or family and social problems. From the sight indicates the bad psychological state of the viewer, such as a feeling of despair, frustration, and dissatisfaction. As for seeing a ring with a red coral lobe on it, it is auspicious because it indicates goodness, success, strength, authority, or influence. title: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the ring is one of the happy things that adds happiness to many people, especially loved ones and spouses. Or diamonds or silver, and this depends on his financial situation, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says when he saw the ring in a dream: The silver ring in a dream. It symbolizes kindness and sustenance, while the ring indicates the dignity and prestige that a person possesses. The silver ring indicates the marriage of a single man and his wife and its beauty among married people. Whoever sees that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, gives him a silver ring, it is a good omen that brings blessings and happiness to the dreamer. The silver ring in The dream is a good omen that symbolizes the wife and son, and also indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better in all aspects of his life. Whoever buys a silver ring in a dream can buy a new car or a new house, and purchasing it may indicate that he will reach a prominent position. In return, the ring Made of gold is a bad omen, and seeing it means fire, and a copper ring is a sign of the jinn. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream for a single girl: This vision carries different connotations, including good and evil. We mention it in detail in the following points: The ring in a dream symbolizes marriage or a life partner. If the ring is made of silver, this is evidence of her separation from the person with whom she had an emotional relationship, while he gave her a silver ring indicating the date of the upcoming wedding. The studded ring indicates With shiny gemstones, it indicates that her life partner will be a man of prestige and power. Breaking a ring in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the end of a romantic relationship that caused her sadness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream for a married woman. We present below an interpretation for a married woman who sees a ring in a dream: In her dream, the husband gives His wife has a ring indicating that she will soon bear good offspring. The ring in a married woman’s dream symbolizes kindness and plenty of sustenance for her and her family. Losing a ring in a married woman’s dream indicates problems between her and her husband that may lead to divorce. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream for a pregnant woman often The interpretation of dreams of a pregnant woman who sees a ring is related to the gender of the fetus. To clarify this, we mention the following: If a pregnant woman sees a golden ring in a dream, this means that she is pregnant with a male child. While seeing a pregnant woman with a silver ring in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a girl. The ring studded with shiny gemstones in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the status of her new child. And his superiority, and that he will become beautiful in his character and morals, and God Almighty alone knows what is in the wombs. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a broken ring in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says about cutting the ring in a dream and other jewelry that this indicates the disappearance of worries and problems, in the event that the dreamer does not regret it. On cutting it off. Whereas if the dreamer is sad in his dream that the ring is cut off, this indicates that

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about the dead of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that includes the dead, seeing the dreamer in a dream that there is a dead person embracing him is one of the visions that some people like because of the lack of dead people they love, so we find that many people are looking for this vision to know its meaning, follow us in this article to explain to you all the visions related to embracing the dead, and there are also many interpretations such as: Interpretation of a dream of embracing the dead and crying. , Hugging the dead father in a dream, interpretation of a dream about hugging the dead from behind, interpretation of a dream about hugging the dead, peace be upon him, interpretation of a dream about hugging the dead tightly. Interpretation of a dream about the union of the dead Meeting the dead in a dream is one of the visions that suggest goodness and food, and seeing the dead joining the pregnant woman in a dream symbolizes the long life that the dreamer will enjoy and invite the deceased and bring friendships. If the dreamer is seen dead and is afraid and nervous, this symbolizes the emergence of bad things in the dreamer's life. Hugging a dead person in a dream means traveling to a distant place and moving from one place to another. Hugging the dead in a dream is evidence that you are reaping good deeds, good morals and a good reputation behind the dead. If the dreamer is poor, the vision indicates an improvement in living conditions, an increase in material income and a feeling of stability. If there are many problems and troubles in the dreamer's life and he sees this vision, it is good for these problems and consequences to disappear. Interpretation of a dream about the inclusion of the dead by Ibn Sirin If the deceased joined the dreamer and in the past there were many problems between them, we find that seeing him in a dream is evidence of forgiveness and an apology for Any mistakes committed by the dreamer against him. If the dreamer sees that the deceased feels pain in his head, it symbolizes the lack of honor of his family and the shortcomings of their rights and treating them in the worst ways. Hugging the dead in a dream is a good dream that shows the dreamer's justice to his family. Seeing the deceased hugging the dreamer in a dream and giving him a speech means that the deceased will provide the dreamer with many important tips and instructions that must be followed in order to benefit from life experiences. Seeing the deceased hugging the dreamer tightly and crying loudly is considered a warning vision that indicates an evil omen, including committing many sins and disobeying the dreamer. Interpretation of the dream of Ibn Shaheen's corpse According to what was reported by Ibn Shaheen in the interpretation of the dream of hugging the dead in a dream, the following: Ibn Shaheen sees in the interpretation of the dream that hugging the dead in a dream is one of the commendable visions, indicating an abundance of lawful livelihood, intimacy and love. The dream of the deceased hugging the dreamer and thanking him is a sign of trust and gratitude for the friendships and supplications that the dreamer directs to him. Seeing the dead in general in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate goodness and that what The dead person says in a dream is nothing but a message. Seeing the dead person hugging the dreamer shows a sense of deficiency and longing for him. Dreaming of hugging the deceased in a dream is evidence of a strong relationship between the deceased and the dreamer, whether in work or in friendship. If the deceased is seen in a dream, his appearance is strong and full of health and activity, it symbolizes longevity, health and well-being

title: Learn about the interpretation of a door in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about an iron door

preview.html: The door in the door has many interpretations and meanings, noting that the interpretation varies according to the shape, nature and color of the door itself and based on the desire of many, and we will point out the most important interpretations of seeing the door in a dream according to what Ibn Shirin and Ibn Shaheen said. The door in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a door in a dream is a sign of the standard of living In which the dreamer lives. As for someone who sees during his sleep that he is changing the door of the house, it is a sign of moving to a new house in the coming period. The dream also shows an improvement in the dreamer’s living situation and his goals. Seeing an open door in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s great diet and there is a high probability For the opportunity to travel in the future. Seeing a closed door in a suitor’s dream is a sign of postponing marriage or ending the entire engagement due to the worsening of the problem. Seeing a wooden door in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will make new friends in the next period. A bright door in a dream is a sign of abundant food and good luck. Dream door by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing an open door in a dream is a sign that something new will happen to the dreamer and that he will receive a lot of news in the coming period. Buying new doors in a dream is a good vision that symbolizes the emergence of many radical changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life, knowing that he will be able to achieve all his goals. As for someone who sees that the door of his house is closed in a dream, this is evidence that he prefers solitude and solitude and does not like communication. with people. The dream is a sign of his unwillingness to perform religious duties and his failure to perform the duties of prayer, and it is important to get closer to God Almighty. As for the sick person, seeing the open door in the dream is evidence of recovery and return to health and well-being again, but it is important to continue praying, believes Ibn You will see that open doors are sources of livelihood in a dream. It symbolizes the dreamer obtaining a new promotion in his field of work. As for the interpretation of the open door in the student’s dream, it is evidence of excellence and advancement to higher levels. As for the one who dreams that more than one door will be opened before him, Ibn Sirin established in his beloved book the saying of God Almighty: “We The gates of Paradise were opened by pouring water. This symbolizes that the doors of sustenance and goodness will open before the dreamer, and God knows best. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Website on the Internet on Google. A dream door for a single woman: Seeing a door in a dream is one of the good visions that bring a lot of goodness and nourishment to the dreamer. The dream promises her that she will be able to get rid of the difficulties and fears of her life and ultimately reach her goals. She will be able to face all the obstacles that appear in her way, good news for the emergence of many positive changes in the dreamer’s life. As for those looking for a new job, the dream promises them that they will find a new job in the near future with a high salary, through which they will be able to improve their situation.
